adm0IsoParam.description: Search by country 2 letter ISO 3166 code
adm0IsoParam.name: adm0_iso

afterParam.description: Pagination cursor value. This should be treated as an opaque value created by the server and returned as the link to the next result page, which may be empty. For historical reasons, this is based on the integer record ID values, but that should not be assumed to be the case in the future.
afterParam.name: after

bboxParam.description: Geographic search using a bounding box, with coordinates in (min_lon, min_lat, max_lon, max_lat) order as a comma separated string
bboxParam.name: bbox

feedParam.description: Search for records in this feed
feedParam.name: feed_onestop_id

idParam.description: Search for a specific internal ID
idParam.name: id

includeAlertsParam.description: Include alerts from GTFS Realtime feeds
includeAlertsParam.name: include_alerts

licenseCommercialUseAllowedParam.description: Filter entities by feed license 'commercial_use_allowed' value. Please see Source Feed concept for details on license values. 'exclude_no' is equivalent to 'yes' and 'unknown'.
licenseCommercialUseAllowedParam.name: license_commercial_use_allowed

licenseCreateDerivedProductParam.description: Filter entities by feed license 'create_derived_product' value. Please see Source Feed concept for details on license values. 'exclude_no' is equivalent to 'yes' and 'unknown'.
licenseCreateDerivedProductParam.name: license_create_derived_product

licenseRedistributionAllowedParam.description: Filter entities by feed license 'redistribution_allowed' value. Please see Source Feed concept for details on license values. 'exclude_no' is equivalent to 'yes' and 'unknown'.
licenseRedistributionAllowedParam.name: license_redistribution_allowed

licenseShareAlikeOptionalParam.description: Filter entities by feed license 'share_alike_optional' value. Please see Source Feed concept for details on license values. 'exclude_no' is equivalent to 'yes' and 'unknown'.
licenseShareAlikeOptionalParam.name: license_share_alike_optional

licenseUseWithoutAttributionParam.description: Filter entities by feed license 'use_without_attribution' value. Please see Source Feed concept for details on license values. 'exclude_no' is equivalent to 'yes' and 'unknown'.
licenseUseWithoutAttributionParam.name: license_use_without_attribution

limitParam.description: Maximum number of records to return
limitParam.name: limit

onestopParam.description: Search for a specific Onestop ID
onestopParam.name: onestop_id

radiusParam.description: Search radius (meters); requires lat and lon
radiusParam.name: radius

relativeDateParam.description: Search for departures on a relative date label, e.g. TODAY, TUESDAY, NEXT_WEDNESDAY
relativeDateParam.name: relative_date

sha1Param.description: Search for records in this feed version
sha1Param.name: feed_version_sha1

parameters.description: Use a fall-back service date if the requested service_date is outside the active service period of the feed version. The fall-back date is selected as the matching day-of-week in the week which provides the best level of scheduled service in the feed version. This value defaults to true.
parameters.name: use_service_window
